abilities.name: Energy Trans
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), move a Grass Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Venusaur ex is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Pollen Hazard
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned, Burned, and Confused.
